page.title: 13HOME LIFE 1
page.content: I get up on a Saturday morning at 7.30 and let my dog Rusty out. He is a brown and white Cocker Spaniel. I take him for a walk up the glen which is about 15 minutes away from my house. My dog likes to play in the River Esk. When I return home 35 minutes later I have my breakfast of cornflakes, toast with marmalade and a glass of milk. We usually drive to Dalkeith to buy the weekly shopping and the daily newspaper. For dinner we usually have cold meat and salad with fresh orange to drink and cakes from the bakers. In the afternoon I sometimes help my Dad prepare his Trials bike. His hobby is scrambling. Sometimes I help my Mum in the garden, cutting the grass and watering the plants, if they need it. We often take the dog for a longer walk in the evening.
